__TOC__

The Ubuntu California podcast will be a monthly podcast with lively discussion about Ubuntu and Open Source news and developments that focuses on topics relevant to residents of California.

==== Schedule ====

Initially, this should be a monthly podcast.  Depending on production resources, a biweekly podcast may be possible.

==== Target Audience ====

The podcast will primarily focus on topics and stories geared towards the end user as opposed to in-depth technical subjects, although segments with a variety of technical appeal is desirable.

==== Format ====

The podcast will be an audio production with MP3 and Ogg Vorbis files available.
